content: According to some studies, acupuncture can help reduce symptoms of menopause like hot flashes, mood swings, insomnia, and vaginal dryness. However, more research is needed to confirm its effectiveness. Acupuncture has also been shown to have few or no side effects and can be used in conjunction with other treatments. It is recommended to consult with a licensed acupuncturist to determine whether it is the right treatment option for the individual case.
